00055 #ifndef _HPHOB_POINTS_HEADER_INCLUDED
00056 #define _HPHOB_POINTS_HEADER_INCLUDED

00058 #include <basics.H>
00059 #include <HbondPoints.H>  // To check for overlap with hbonds
00060 #include <hphob_point_t.H>
00061 #include <GenPointsParameters.H>
00062 #include <hphob_triads.H>
00063 
00064 namespace SimSite3D{
00065 
00066 
00067   typedef std::list<hphob_point_t>                      list_of_hphobs;
00068   typedef point_storage<hphob_point_t>                  hphob_point_vec;
00069   typedef hphob_point_vec::iterator                     hphob_point_vi;
00070   typedef hphob_point_vec::const_iterator               hphob_point_vci;
00071   typedef point_storage<hphob_point_t, list_of_hphobs>  hphob_point_list;
00072   typedef hphob_point_list::iterator                    hphob_point_li;
00073   typedef hphob_point_list::const_iterator              hphob_point_lci;
00074 
00076   class HphobPoints{
00077   public:
00078 
00080     HphobPoints(std::istream& in, const uint num_lines, PDBBase& atoms, 
00081                 PDBBase& points);
00082 
00084     HphobPoints(const GenPointsParameters::hphob_method_t method_in, 
00085                 const double cluster_diameter_in = 3.5,
00086                 const sphere_sample_level_t sample_level_in = 
00087                 DISCRETE_SPHERE_LEVEL_ZERO);
00088 
00089     void init_positions_octree(const my_float_t max_dist, 
00090                                const my_float_t min_side_len,
00091                                const uint max_numel);
00092     
00094     hphob_point_lci 
00095     begin() const
00096     { return points.begin(); }
00097 
00099     hphob_point_lci 
00100     end() const
00101     { return points.end(); }
00102 
00104     void 
00105     transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00106     { points.transform(R, T); }
00107 
00110     void 
00111     inverse_transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T)
00112     { points.inverse_transform(R, T); }
00113 
00115     void 
00116     revert()
00117     { points.revert(); }
00118 
00119     hphob_point_lci 
00120     closest_point(const my_float_t* pos, my_float_t* d) const
00121     { return points.closest_point(pos, d); }
00122 
00125     inline my_float_t
00126     compute_RMSD() const
00127     { return points.compute_RMSD(); }
00128 
00130 
00133     size_t 
00134     size() const
00135     { return points.size(); }
00136 
00137     bool gen_points(const interact_atoms_vec& hphob_atoms,
00138                     const hphob_triad_vec& hphob_triads,
00139                     const std::vector<atom_vci>& rad_atoms,
00140                     BoundingVolume* site_vol);
00141 
00142     void cull_too_close_to_polar(hbond_fit_pt_vci hbonds_begin,
00143                                  hbond_fit_pt_vci hbonds_end);
00144 
00145     static bool atom_is_hphob(const residue_type res, const atom_type atom,
00146                               const hphob_triad_t** triad_ptr);
00147 
00150     inline void
00151     get_current_inverse_3D_transform(Quaternion *Q, my_float_t *T) const
00152     {
00153       points.get_current_inverse_3D_transform(Q, T);
00154     }
00155 
00156   private:
00157 
00158     bool grid_point_methods(const std::vector<atom_vci>& rad_atoms,
00159                             BoundingVolume* site_vol);
00160 
00161     bool pseudo_surface_points(const interact_atoms_vec& hphob_atoms,
00162                                const hphob_triad_vec& hphob_triads,
00163                                const std::vector<atom_vci>& rad_atoms,
00164                                BoundingVolume* site_vol);
00165 
00166     bool get_hphobic_atoms(const std::vector<atom_vci>& rad_atoms);
00167 
00168     void add_point(const my_float_t* pos, hphob_point_vec* pts_vec);
00169     void add_point(const my_float_t* pos, hphob_point_list* pts_list);
00170 
00171     static void init_hphob_nbrs_tbl();
00172     
00173     GenPointsParameters::hphob_method_t method;
00174     sphere_sample_level_t sphere_sample_level;
00175     double cluster_diameter;
00176     hphob_point_list points;
00177 
00178     static hphob_triad_map_t hphob_nbrs_tbl;
00179 
00180     static const my_float_t MIN_HYDRO_DIST; 
00181     static const my_float_t MAX_HYDRO_DIST; 
00182     static const my_float_t HPHIL_CUTOFF;  
00183     static const std::string A_fname; 
00184   };
00185 }
